definition: to turn back/to backtrack/(fig.) to revert to the former way of doing things
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I walk slowly, but I never walk back.
sentences.chinese: 也許走得慢點兒，可我絕不會走回頭路。

sentences.english: I am a slow walker, but I never walk back.
sentences.chinese: 我走的不快，但絕不走回頭路。

sentences.english: Yet now I was going back.
sentences.chinese: 然而我開始走回頭路了。

sentences.english: Once you start, don't look back.
sentences.chinese: 一旦開始流程後，就不要走回頭路。

sentences.english: And then we walked down and visited the swan lake and grass lake.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們再走回頭路，參觀了天鵝海和芳草海。

sentences.english: Consequently, we reached a situation where it's quite impossible to come back.
sentences.chinese: 自然的，以我們現在的形勢不能再走回頭路了。

sentences.english: I paid the fee in one lump sum and I told myself, "No turning back".
sentences.chinese: 我付了費，一筆過，我告訴自己，“不會走回頭路”。

sentences.english: You have to look forward, because life will not go back.
sentences.chinese: 你得朝前看，因爲生命不會走回頭路。

sentences.english: Gorbachev’s reforms either were ignored or they were enacted with perverse consequences.
sentences.chinese: 戈爾巴喬夫的改革要麼被忽略，要麼走回頭路。

sentences.english: Never look back unless you want to go that way.
sentences.chinese: 不要回頭望，除非想走回頭路。

sentences.english: It is a forward only reader, meaning that you can't go backwards.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個只轉發器，這意味着你不能走回頭路。

sentences.english: Move on, for life is not meant to be traveled backwards.
sentences.chinese: 要往前走，因爲生命不會走回頭路。
